name: Digital Luxury Group (DLG)
tag_list: digital, luxury, social-media, sem, analytics, intelligence, worldwatchreport
overview:
Connecting iconic brands to their clientele online.

The Digital Luxury Group (DLG) is the privileged partner of iconic brands willing to develop successful online relationships with their clientele, through exclusive and tailor-made strategies. Formerly IC-Agency SA, the Digital Luxury Group (DLG) holds a strong edge in the digital luxury field, especially in Haute Horlogerie, thanks to the WorldWatchReport, a baseline market study published since 2004 in partnership with EuropaStar and the precious support of the Fondation de la Haute Horlogerie.

Headquartered in Geneva, the Digital Luxury Group (DLG) relies on a network of partners based in China, the United States and Dubai.
